messages.message: WORDFORM is an animateThe plural suffix for animate nouns is "-ak." noun.
WORDFORM is an inanimateThe plural suffix for inanimate nouns is "-a." noun.
Notice the noun ends in a "k"Add "-w-" because of stem final "-k.".
This noun needs a -w-.
WORDFORM does not end in a "k" or a semi-voweluse the suffix "-ihk.".
WORDFORM ends in a semi-vowelRemember to drop the semi-vowel and lengthen the vowel before it. Then add "-hk.".
WORDFORM ends in "iw" and acts irregularly Keep the "w" and lengthen the "i" before it. Then add "-hk.".
Notice the WORDFORM ends in a "k"Use "-ohk.".
WORDFORM is irregular.It takes the suffix "-ihk.".
WORDFORM ends in a vowel. Add the "-hk" suffix to the end..
Do you have the correct suffixThe suffix should look like "-îhk."?
Do you have the correct suffixThe suffix should look like "-âhk."?
Do you have the correct suffixThe suffix should look like "-ôhk."?
The baseform ends in a "k."
The baseform does not end in a "k" or a semi-vowel.
The baseform ends in a semi-vowelThe semi-vowel was dropped and the preceding vowel was lengthened..
The baseform ends in a vowel.
Remove the derived diminutive suffix.
Remove the derived diminutive suffix"-os" to find the base form.
Remove the derived diminutive suffix"-is" to find the base form.
Remove the derived diminutive suffix to find the baseformDon't forget to re-add the semi-vowel and shorten the final vowel..
Remove the diminutive suffix"-osis" to find the base form.
Notice that this noun contains "t"Remember that "t" becomes "c" in the diminutive form..
Use the 1S possessive prefixThe 1S possessive prefix is "n(i)-"..
Use the 2S possessive prefixThe 2S possessive prefix is "k(i)-"..
Use the 3S possessive prefixThe 3S possessive prefix is "o-" or "w-"..
Use the 3' possessive prefixThe 3' possessive prefix is "o-" or "w-".
Don't forget to add the obviativeThe obviative suffix is "-a". suffix!
and suffixThe 3' possessive suffix is "-iyiw"..
Use the 1P possessive prefixThe 1P possessive prefix is "n(i)-".
and suffixThe 1P suffix is "-inân"..
Use the 2I possessive prefixThe 2I possessive prefix is "k(i)-."
and suffixThe 2I suffix is "-inaw"..
Use the 2P possessive prefixThe 2P possessive prefix is "o-" or "w-".
Use the 3P possessive prefixThe 3P possessive prefix is "o-" or "w-".
and suffix The 2P possessive suffix is "-inân"..
and suffix The 2P possessive suffix is "-inân"..
WORDFORM is an animate intransitive (AI) verbRemember that the final ê becomes â for first and second person forms of AI verbs in independent mode. and this question is asking for the
WORDFORM is a transitive inanimate (TI) verbRemember that the final a becomes ê for first and second person forms of TI verbs in independent mode. and this question is asking for the
WORDFORM is a transitive animate (TA) verb and this question is asking for the
1S formThe 1S form of an AI verb uses the ni- prefix and the -n suffix..
2S formThe 2S form of an AI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -n suffix..
3S formThe 3S form of an AI verb uses the -w suffix..
1P formThe 1P form of a TI verb uses the ni- prefix and the -nân suffix..
2I formThe 2I form of an AI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -naw suffix..
2P formThe 2P form of an AI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -nâwâw suffix..
3P formThe 3P form of an AI verb uses the -wak suffix..
3' formThe 3' form of an AI verb uses the -yiwa suffix. .
1S conjunct formThe 1S conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yân suffix..
2S conjunct formThe 2S conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yan suffix..
3S conjunct formThe 3S conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -t suffix..
1P conjunct formThe 1P conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yâhk suffix..
2I conjunct formThe 2I conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yahk suffix..
2P conjunct formThe 2P conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yêk suffix..
3P conjunct formThe 3P conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -cik suffix..
3' formThe 3' conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -yit suffix. .
1S formThe 1S form of a TI verb uses the ni- prefix and the -n suffix..
2S formThe 2S form of a TI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -n suffix..
3S formThe 3S form of a TI verb uses the -m suffix..
1P formThe 1P form of a TI verb uses the ni- prefix and the -nân suffix..
2I formThe 2I form of a TI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -naw suffix..
2P formThe 2P form of a TI verb uses the ki- prefix and the -nâwâw suffix..
3P formThe 3P form of a TI verb uses the -mwak suffix..
3' formThe 3' form of an TI verb uses the -miyiwa suffix. .
1S conjunct formThe 1S conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -mân suffix..
2S conjunct formThe 2S conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -man suffix..
3S conjunct formThe 3S conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -hk suffix..
1P conjunct formThe 1P conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -mâhk suffix..
2I conjunct formThe 2I conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -mahk suffix..
2P conjunct formThe 2P conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -mêk suffix..
3P conjunct formThe 3P conjunct form of a TI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -hkik suffix..
3' conjunct formThe 3' conjunct form of an AI verb uses the ê- prefix and the -miyit suffix. .
1S->3S formThe 1S->3S form of a TA verb uses the ni- prefix and the -âw suffix..
2S->3S formThe 2S->3S form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -âw suffix..
3S->3' formThe 3S->3' form of a TA verb uses the -êw suffix..
1P->3S formThe 1P->3S form of a TA verb uses the ni- prefix and the -ânân suffix..
2I->3S formThe 2I->3S form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -ânaw suffix..
2P->3S formThe 2P->3S form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -âwâw suffix..
3P->3' formThe 3P->3' form of a TA verb uses the -êwak suffix..
3'->3' formThe 3'->3' form of a TA verb uses the -êyiwa suffix..
1S->3P formThe 1S->3P form of a TA verb uses the ni- prefix and the -âwak suffix..
2S->3P formThe 2S->3P form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -âwak suffix..
1P->3P formThe 1P->3P form of a TA verb uses the ni- prefix and the -ânânak suffix..
2I->3P formThe 2I->3P form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -ânawak suffix..
2P->3P formThe 2P->3P form of a TA verb uses the ki- prefix and the -âwâwak suffix..
1S->3S conjunct formThe 1S->3S conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -ak suffix..
2S->3S conjunct formThe 2S->3S conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -at suffix..
3S->3' conjunct formThe 3S->3' conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -ât suffix..
1P->3S conjunct formThe 1P->3S conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyâhk suffix..
2I->3S conjunct formThe 2I->3S conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyahk suffix..
2P->3S conjunct formThe 2P->3S conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyêk suffix..
3P->3' conjunct formThe 3P->3' conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âcik suffix..
3'->3' conjunct formThe 3'->3' conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyit suffix..
1S->3P conjunct formThe 1S->3P conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -akik suffix..
2S->3P conjunct formThe 2S->3P conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -atacik suffix..
1P->3P conjunct formThe 1P->3P conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyâhkik suffix..
2I->3P conjunct formThe 2I->3P conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyahkik suffix..
2P->3P conjunct formThe 2P->3P conjunct form of a TA verb uses the ê- prefix and the -âyêkok suffix..
Notice that WORDFORM starts with a vowel-t- is the vowel joiner in independent mode..
Don't forget to include the past tense marker The past tense marker is "kî". It appears in front of the verb and closest to the verb stem..
Don't forget to include the future intentional marker The future intentional marker is "wî". It appears in front of the verb and closest to the verb stem..
Don't forget to include the future definite marker The future intentional marker is "ka". It appears in front of the verb and closest to the verb stem..
